content.data: Who will actually be awakened from the sleep of maya, he will enshrine the Lord the sleep of maya, he will enshrine the Lord in hi heart the sage accepted the voice of the lady-gardener as true and as the power of kindling the knowledge of Yoga.210.
ਜੋ ਯੋਗ ਦੇ ਧਿਆਨ ਵਿਚ ਲਗੇ ਹੋਏ ਹਨ, ਉਹੀ ਇਸ (ਗੱਲ) ਨੂੰ ਜਾਣ ਸਕਦੇ ਹਨ ॥੨੧੦॥
